name: System Shock 2
notes:
GOG Installer Required

Getting errors during the install (such as variable out of range) is not uncommon. It should still install fine

files.game:
N/A:Select the System Shock 2 installer donwloaded from GOG 
Download here: https://secure.gog.com/downlink/system_shock_2/en1installer0

content:
files:
- game: "N/A:Select the System Shock 2 installer donwloaded from GOG \nDownload here:\
    \ https://secure.gog.com/downlink/system_shock_2/en1installer0"
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/System Shock 2/Shock2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: /silent /nogui
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
